title: Cards
text:
Maricruz have a lot of cards, she always uses her cards to build pyramids as shown in the following image:A pyramid card of 3 levels. She always wonder how many cards does she need to make a pyramid card ofNlevels. 
Your task is to answer that question.InputThe first line of the input contains an integer 1 ≤T≤ 1,000. Each of the followingTlines will have an integer 1 ≤N≤ 1,000,000.OutputFor each case, output a single line consisting of the number of cards needed to build a pyramid card of levelNmodulo 1,000,007.ExampleInput Example2
3
7Output Example15
77
